descriptions.description:
We are pleased that you can join us to celebrate our wedding celebration this September 5th in Tahoe, California.

**Need a place to stay?**

Consider staying at the Village at Squaw Valley where we will be staying ourselves. We have negotiated special rates for our guests, to book online, please use [this room block reservation link]([https://book.squawalpine.com/​Ecomm/Package/Package/9801138/​en-US/?packageid=56589&​promocode=CheMarzejon](https://book.squawalpine.com/Ecomm/Package/Package/9801138/en-US/?packageid=56589&promocode=CheMarzejon)). Alternatively, you may call the Resort’s Reservations Department at [866-818-6963](tel:866-818-6963).
Cieszymy się, że możesz dołączyć do nas, aby świętować nasze wesele 5 września w Kalifornii.
我們很高興您可以加入我們，於9月5日在加利福尼亞州塔霍市慶祝我們的結婚慶典。
